scripts.update:doc: npm run gitclean && typedoc && git add --all && git commit -S -am "doc: update api documentation" && npm run document -w website && git-cliff > CHANGELOG.md && git commit -am "doc: update CHANGELOG"
scripts.release:major: turbo run gitclean && npm run release:prepare && npm run update:doc && turbo run gitclean && turbo run bump:major && npm run commit:major && npm publish --workspaces
scripts.release:minor: turbo run gitclean && npm run release:prepare && npm run update:doc && turbo run gitclean && turbo run bump:minor && npm run commit:minor && npm publish --workspaces
scripts.release:patch: turbo run gitclean && npm run release:prepare && npm run update:doc && turbo run gitclean && turbo run bump:patch && npm run commit:patch && npm publish --workspaces
scripts.tag: git push && git push --tags && rm -rf build/temp
scripts.commit:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && scripts/commitVersion.sh && npm run build
scripts.commit:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && scripts/commitVersion.sh && npm run build
scripts.commit:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && scripts/commitVersion.sh && npm run build
